kr.ac.mju.islab

Class RewardScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • kr.ac.mju.islab.RewardScheme

  • public class RewardScheme
extends java.lang.Object
    RewardScheme class implements 'Privacy-Aware Reward System'.

    If you are not interested in detailed implementation, you would better use RewardServer/RewardQuery to make application based on Reward Scheme.

    RewardServer/RewardQuery is a concrete implementation the Reward Scheme.

    Since:
    2017-03-08
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    jwlee

      Hash class provides several hash-related methods which is dedicated to RewardScheme class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RewardScheme

        public RewardScheme()
        Class constructor - default set to curve type a (symmetric) and SHA256.

      • RewardScheme

        public RewardScheme(kr.ac.mju.islab.secParam.CurveName curveName,
                    kr.ac.mju.islab.secParam.HashName hashName)
        Class constructor specifying curve name and hash name.

        Supported curves: a, a1, d159, d201, d224, e, f, g149.
        Supported hashes: SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512.

        Parameters:
        curveName - the name of elliptic curve
        hashName - the name of hash function

    • Method Detail

      • configureAsHelper

        public void configureAsHelper(it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element y,
                              it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element g1,
                              it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element g2)
        Configure y, g1, g2 same as those of Master's so that RewardScheme object of Helper can properly communicate with RewardScheme object of Master. This is same as setting y, g1, g2 individually.
        Parameters:
        y - Master's public key
        g1 - generator of G1 that Master is using
        g2 - generator of G2 that Master is using

      • recIssueHelperPre

        public it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element[] recIssueHelperPre()
        Returns random serial number s, random number r, and computed value h to Helper. Helper will use there data in recIssue Process. Especially, h will be sent to Master to generate psi.
        Returns:
        the serial number s, random number r, and computed h in Element[] form with corresponding order.

      • recIssueMaster

        public it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element recIssueMaster(it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element h)
        Returns element psi which master generates in recIssue Process. Helper provides h, and later generates receipt sigma with returned value psi.
        Parameters:
        h - the element generated and provided by Helper
        Returns:
        the mid-computation element psi for Helper

      • recIssueHelperPost

        public it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element recIssueHelperPost(it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element r,
                                                        it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element psi,
                                                        it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element y)
        Returns the receipt sigma for Helper. sigma, along with random number s and verification key y, will be used in verification process.
        Parameters:
        r - mid-computation value generate by Helper
        psi - mid-computation value generated by Master
        y - the verification key vk
        Returns:
        the receipt sigma for Helper

      • verify

        public boolean verify(it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element sigma,
                      it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element s,
                      it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element y)
        Returns boolean value which indicates the validness of the signature sigma.
        Parameters:
        sigma - the receipt generated by Helper
        s - the random number generated by Helper
        y - the verification key vk
        Returns:
        validness of the signature sigma

      • aggregate

        public it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element aggregate(java.util.List<it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element> sigmaList)
        Returns aggregated sigma from provided signature sigmas.
        Parameters:
        sigmaList - the arraylist of signature sigma
        Returns:
        aggregated signature sigma

      • aggVerify

        public boolean aggVerify(it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element sigmaAgg,
                         java.util.List<it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element> sList,
                         java.util.List<it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.Element> yList)
        Returns boolean value which indicates the validness of the aggregated signature sigma.
        Parameters:
        sigmaAgg - the aggregated signature sigma
        sList - the arraylist of random serial number s
        yList - the arraylist of verification key vk, or y
        Returns:
        validness of the aggregated signature sigma
